lesson.title: Network Effects in DeFi
lesson.objective: Understand how communities drive protocol growth

sections.content: Protocols don't grow through advertising - they grow through users bringing users. Every referral strengthens the network, increases liquidity, and improves outcomes for everyone.

By guiding another user to the protocol, you become part of the growth engine. Your on-chain referral is permanent proof of contribution. Many protocols reward referrers with bonuses or governance weight.

content: Network effects = more users = more value for all
Referrals are tracked on-chain, creating verifiable contribution history
Communities built on referrals are often more engaged
Your network becomes part of your on-chain reputation

questions.question: Why are network effects important for protocols?
options: More users increases value for everyone
